com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class LinearLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LinearLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layout

    public final class LinearLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements Layout
    Linear layout for placing components horizontally or vertically.

      • LinearLayout

        LinearLayout(Context context,
             int orientation)
        Creates a new linear layout.

        context - view context
        orientation - one of ComponentConstants.LAYOUT_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL. ComponentConstants.LAYOUT_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL

      • LinearLayout

        LinearLayout(Context context,
             int orientation,
             java.lang.Integer preferredEmptyWidth,
             java.lang.Integer preferredEmptyHeight)
        Creates a new linear layout with a preferred empty width/height.
        Parameters:
        context - view context
        orientation - one of ComponentConstants.LAYOUT_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL. ComponentConstants.LAYOUT_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL
        preferredEmptyWidth - the preferred width of an empty layout
        preferredEmptyHeight - the preferred height of an empty layout
